}

}

public void sendMessage(int a) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a];
}

public void additem(int a) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a];
}
public void alltome(int a) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a];
}[/code]
